summary: A Re-Texture of Echo 1162 Field Mage Outfit.
descriptionHtml:
Field Mage Re-Texture
Author - DreamBurrow
Orignal Mesh - echo 1162

--------------------------
Description:

X\'D Hello Hello!! Thanks to Echo 1162, I\'ve been given permission to release another re-texture!

This is a retexture I made for the Field Mage Outfit!! (For CBBE)
By Echo 1162

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198

You must download the original outfit, install it, then install my re-texture after!

This is one of my earliest re-textures, so it might look a little weird, but I ask that you forgive that :D.

Thank you for download! And be sure to upload pictures of your amazing characters!

For the UNP mesh by turbosundance::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18787

No standalone will be made :D. 

--------------------------
Installation: 

Copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------------------
Uninstallation: 

Remove the following folders:

Data\\textures\\clothes\\fieldmage

Or uninstall using NMM. 
---------------------------

Known Issues:

Poor quality lol. Sorry, I\'m pretty noobish at retexturing! 

---------------------------

Credits:

Bethesda - Skyrim

echo 1162 - For graciously giving me permission to upload a re-texture for her amazing 
fieldmage outfit.
author: DreamBurrow
